Today, he is requesting to borrow $1000 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase car textiles and sponges to help with his business. In the future, he plans to further expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase car textiles and sponges

loans.name: Kassem

texts.en:
Kassem is a 32-year-old, married man who has been working as a painter for ten years. Kassem enjoys painting houses and walls and feels proud when he finishes a project. 
Kassem is requesting a loan from Al Majmoua for the second time to buy a car which he needs to transport his tools and paints from one project to another. His previous loan was very positive and helped a lot in improving both his social and financial situations. 
This car is his entire dream right now. He hopes he it will help him to take on more than one project at a time as it will mean transportation is not a problem.

loans.use: To buy a car for his business

loans.name: Gaby

texts.en: Gaby is a 25-year-old, married man from Lebanon living with his wife. He has been working in the architectural field for the past five years and, at the same time, pursuing his education. Today, he is an experienced architect. His work consists of providing customers with precise external surfaces. He cooperates with his wife who works as a teacher to  meet the family's needs. Today, he is requesting $1100 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to be able to purchase his own stamp. He states that this stamp will help him proceed with his business operations independently and will allow him to better promote his services. In the future, he plans to open his own office.

loans.use: to purchase his own stamp

loans.name: Dukorerehamwe/msny Group

texts.fr:
Eugène  fait partie du groupe Dukorerehamwe. Le nom du groupe signifie « travaillons ensemble ». Il a 42 ans et il est marié avec 3 enfants de 3 à 8 ans, dont 3 scolarisés. Son niveau d’éducation est  3 ans de secondaire.

Eugène est cultivateur de riz. C’est son premier cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des engrais chimiques pour son agriculture de riz. 

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est de faire la semence sélectionnée du riz et utilisation des fertilisants. Dans les prochaines années, Eugène voudrait être parmi les meilleurs cultivateurs de riz dans sa région et acheter d’autres surfaces de riz. Avec les profits, il prévoit d’éduquer et soigne ses enfants.
texts.en:
Eugène is a member of the Dukorerehamwe group.  The group's name means 'Let's Work Together'.  Eugène is 42 years old, married, and has three children who are between 3 and 8 years old.  All three are in school.  Eugène completed three years of his secondary education.

Eugène is a rice farmer and this is his first loan cycle with ACB.  He will use his loan to buy chemical fertilizers for his rice crop.

Eugène's strategy for growing his business is to sow selected rice seed and use fertilizers.  In the coming years, he would like to become one of the best rice growers in his region and buy more land for growing rice.  He plans to use the profits he makes to educate and take care of his children.

loans.use: to buy chemical fertilizers for his rice crop

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers and garden tools

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase more stationary and toys, shelves and lights to improve the store

loans.name: Roudayna

texts.en: Roudayna is a 35-year-old married woman from Lebanon. She is living with her husband and four children. She has been working selling traditional Lebanese food products from her home for the past five years. She works hard to support her family in cooperation with her husband, who works in the Lebanese army. Today, she is requesting to borrow $1000 from Kiva's partner, Ameen s.a.l., to increase her inventory of food products for the winter months. She says that her business sales increase during this season. In the future, she would like to rent out a space to sell her merchandise.

loans.use: to increase her inventory of food products for the winter months

loans.name: Regina

texts.en: Regina is a 54-year-old married woman. She has four children with ages ranging from 19 to 26 years. She describes herself to be patient. She operates a cereals business in which she sells beans, millet, sorghum, maize and peas. She has been involved in this business for 20 years and employs one staff member. Her business is located in a shopping center in Kisumu. She describes her biggest business challenge to be fire outbreaks. She will use the 70,000 Kenyan shillings loan to add stock of cereals. Her business goal is to become a wholesaler within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will be a renowned supplier of cereals in Kisumu.

loans.use: To buy cereals.

loans.name: Samy

texts.en: Samy is a 44-year-old married man living with his wife and two school-aged children. He is from Lebanon. He has owned a car repair shop since 1990. He specializes in repairing different types of vehicles. During his work years, Samy was able to gain a good number of customers asking for his services. He also notes that he suffered from many bad circumstances. He is requesting to borrow $1000 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to renew his business tools to improve his work and make a higher income.

loans.use: to renew his business tools

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase 2 cattle and 8 sheep

loans.name: Imane

texts.en: Imane is a 39-year-old Lebanese, married woman living with her husband and three children; two of them are still attending school. She has owned a small shop in her town since 2007 where she sells vegetables and a wide range of homemade food. Her husband works as a taxi driver and they cooperate together to be able to meet the high costs of living. Today, she is requesting to borrow $1200 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase additional merchandise needed to increase her productivity and sales and, therefore, her income.

loans.use: to purchase additional merchandise needed

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase 3 calves and 6 lambs

loans.name: Rose Awino

texts.en: Rose is a 26-year-old married woman. She has a child. She describes herself as transparent. She operates a cereals sales business where she sells maize, millet, sorghum, soya and groundnuts. She has been involved in this business for 3 years and employs 1 staff member. Her business is located in a shopping centre in Kisumu. She describes her biggest business challenge as fire outbreaks. She will use the Kes 60,000 loan to add stock of cereals. Her business goal is to grow it to a wholesale operation within 5 years. She hopes that, in the future, she will become a renowned business lady in Kisumu.

loans.use: To add stock of cereals

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase new electrical tools and supplies

loans.name: Nawal

texts.en: Nawal is a 61-year-old Lebanese, married woman living with her husband and three children. She has been working as a tailor for the past 30 years. In 1990 she established a tailoring business from her home. Despite her older age, Nawal is still working and she specializes in sewing clothes and repairing ruined ones. Today, she is requesting to borrow $1100 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to buy textiles and tailoring supplies needed to increase her business productivity. She hopes to further expand her business in the coming years, which she is sure will return higher profits.

loans.use: to buy textiles and tailoring supplies

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase new inventory

loans.name: El Zapotito Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama el zapotito. La  historia es acerca del señora Arcenia, ya que es una de los integrantes que conforman este grupo, ella cuenta con 30 años de edad, está casada con el señor Manuel y tiene 1 hijo, Lizbeth de 4 años la cual está cursando el segundo año de preescolar, se dedica a la elaboración y venta de ropa artesanal, como vestidos, blusas, servilletas y manteles.

Dice que eligió este negocio, ya que quería buscar la manera de apoyar a su esposo e hijo, para así mismo tener una mejor solvencia económica y excelente calidad de vida, aparte de que dice desde pequeña su mama le enseño a elaborarlos aparte de que es una muy buena fuente de ingresos, es por eso que decidió empezar con esta actividad, el préstamo que recibió lo va a invertir, en la compra de mas material como son: telas, cuadrille, hilos, agujas, armazones y chaquira, para continuar con sus ventas.


Doña Arsenia dice que su meta es la de hacer que su negocio crezca empresarialmente, ya que quiere construir un local, puesto que lo que ella mas desea es poner su tienda de ropa artesanal y así dar a conocer un poco de lo que hacen en su comunidad, también para de esta forma tenerlo bien surtido, con más variedad de prendas, para así obtener más y mejores ganancias.  

Ella dice que conoce muy bien a sus compañeras y comenta que son personas muy responsables, gente trabajadora, confiable que tienen ganas de salir adelante y superarse, por lo mismo le están echando muchas ganas.

Da las gracias a FRAC y a los prestatarios de kiva, por darle la oportunidad y confianza, pero sobre todo por creer en él, ya que gracias a su ayuda pudo invertir en su negocio y asi tener una mejor calidad de vida, junto con su familia y un mejor futuro.

Las personas que conforman el grupo de el zapotito son las siguientes: blanca, Isabel, Arsenia y Emilia, quienes se dedican a la elaboración y venta de ropa artesanal.
texts.en:
This group is called El Zapotito.  This story is about Arcenia, one of the members of the group.  She is 30 years old and married to Manuel with one child, Lizbeth, 4, who is in her second year of preschool.  Arcenia makes and sells handmade traditional clothing such as dresses, blouses, napkins, and tablecloths.

She says she chose this business because she was looking for a way to support her husband and child, to have greater financial dependability and an excellent quality of life.  She also says that her mother taught her to make clothing when she was a little girl, and that it is a good source of income.  This is why she decided to begin with this kind of work.

She is going to use the loan she received to buy more material such as fabric, needlework fabric, thread, needles, frames, and embroidery beads to continue with her sales.

Arcenia says her goal is to make her business grow, because she wants to construct a place, since what she most wants is to have a store of handmade clothing as a way to let people know something of the work that is done in her community.  She also wants to have it well stocked, with a greater variety of articles, to have more and better profits.

She says she knows her friends very well, and they are very responsible, hard-working, and trustworthy people who want to get ahead and improve themselves, for which they are working very hard.

She thanks FRAC and the Kiva lenders for giving her the opportunity and self-confidence, but above all for believing in her, since thanks to their help she managed to invest in her business and so have a better quality of life, along with her family, and a better future.

The members of the El Zapotito group are Blanca, Isabel, Arcenia, and Emilia, who make and sell handmade clothing.

loans.use: to buy more materials such as fabric, needlework fabric, thread, needles, frames, and embroidery beads.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more wood for his latest project

loans.name: Daniel Njogu

texts.en: Daniel is a 63-year-old married man. He has 6 children with ages ranging from 17 years to 30 years. He describes himself as visionary. He operates a shoe making business where he sells shoes to locals. He has been involved in this business for 40 years and employs 2 staff members. His business is located in a shopping centre in Kisumu. He describes his biggest business challenge as financial constraints. He will use the Kes 60,000 loan to buy a motorcycle to use in the running of the business. His business goal is to open more shoe shops within 5 years. He hopes that, in the future, he will own the biggest shoe selling business in Kisumu.

loans.use: To buy a motorcycle

loans.name: El Cedral Group

texts.es:
El señor Emilio es miembro D. una UD.(unidad D. desarrollo) conformada por 10 personas cada una D. ellas tiene una actividad economica. Brigida - Abarrotes, Inocencia- Antojitos mexicanos, T.- Compra D. material para contruccion, Teresa- Venta D. refrescos, Amalia- Venta D. pollo, Ruben- Refaccionaria, Diego- Albañileria, Silvia- venta D. papeleria y Cecilia- Refaccionaria. Ellos viven en una comunidad que se caracteriza por estar ubicado en una zona cañera.

Don Emilio tiene la edad D. 35 años, solo estudio la priM., esta casado y tiene dos hijas una que estudiael preescolar y la otra es un bebe. El nos platica que hace un poco mas D. 5 años abrio una pequeña tienda D. abarrotes. El nos dijo "No  siempre hay que estar con las manos vacias hay que buscar trabajar para sacar adelante a la familia en los tiempos dificiles".

El tiene su tienda D. abarrotes en su hogar en la parte D. enfrente D. su casa el construyo un pequeño local  en el que sus clientes lo visitan y le hacen el gasto. "Estoy muy contento porque logra establecer mi negocio  porque aqui solo se trabaja el campo y aveces no hay sale para todo un poquito".

Don Emilio necesita este credito para invertirlo en la compra D. leche, frijol, aceite, vasos, platos desechables, cloro, shampoo, especies, mayonesa, sal, azucar, sopa, jugos, dulces, galletas, veladoras, huevos, chiles, tomates y cebollas  para resurtir su negocio.

El espera que con esta inversion su negocio prospere ya que desea dar una mejor calidad D. vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Emilio is a member of a development unit composed of ten people.  Each of them has an economic activity.  Brigida, groceries; Inocencia, Mexican fast food; T., building materials; Teresa, soft-drink sales; Amalia, chicken sales; Rubén, repair shop; Diego, bricklaying; Silvia, paper goods sales; Cecilia, repair shop.  They all live in a community noted for being located in a sugar cane producing zone.

Emilio is 35 years old; he only completed elementary school.  He’s married and has two daughters.  One of them is in pre-school and the other is still a baby.  He relates to us that a little over five years ago he opened a small grocery store, where his clients come to purchase products.  He told us “One must not always be with one’s hands empty; one has to look for work to support the family during difficult times.”

His store is located in the front part of his house; he built a small locale where his customers can visit him and make their purchases.  “I’m very happy because I succeeded in establishing my store because the only kind of work available here is work in the fields and sometimes earnings are just enough for a little.”

Emilio needs this loan to buy milk, beans, oil, drinking glasses, disposable plates, chlorine bleach, shampoo, spices, mayonnaise, salt, sugar, soup, fruit juices, candy, cookies, votive candles, eggs, chilies, tomatoes and onions to restock his store.  He hopes that with this investment his business will prosper because he wants to proviD. his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for his grocery store.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy thread, needles, fabric, frames, etc.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is a 33-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife and two school-aged children. He has been working in the construction field for the past 10 years. In 2008, he bought a digging machine and started to work with it, sticking with multiple construction projects. 

Today, he is requesting to borrow $1200 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to pay his children’s schooling fees. Ali’s only target is to allow his children to pursue their education properly until graduating.

loans.use: to pay his children’s school fees

loans.name: Yaneth Lourdes

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “KANCHARY”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Yaneth Lourdes; ella tiene 24 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de quesos, ella vende en forma independiente desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar quesos.

  La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Yaneth Lourdes, 24, is a member of the “Kanchary” communal bank that’s located in Cusco District belonging to Cusco Province and Department.  She’s single and has a son.  She alternates her daily activities with a cheese selling business.  She is an independent vendor and works from 7am until 9pm.  She supports her children through this business and wants to expand and improve the cheese sales business so is asking for the loan to buy cheese.  She is happy with the loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy cheese.

loans.name: Jacqueline

texts.en:
Jacqueline is married to a soldier and has 3 children aged 6 to 10. She sells second hand women’s clothes which she buys in Uganda and sells in Rwanda. She has run this business for the last 2 years. She also has a car that she rents out for wedding ceremonies and other events. These two businesses have enabled her to care for her family and expand her business. 

She needs a loan to reinvest in her clothing business.  With the profits she will continue to expand her business and create a better standard of living for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes to sell

loans.name: Andreh

texts.en:
Andreh is a 47-year-old married man from Lebanon. He lives with his wife and two school-aged children. He has been working as a taxi driver since 2000. His main route is between his town and the surrounding villages. He also provides private transportation upon client's demands. 

With his requested loan of $1200 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l, he will be able to perform much needed repairs on his taxi to increase its safety features. In the future, he plans to purchase another car and hire a part-time employee to work in it, in order to increase his business income.

loans.use: to perform much needed repairs on his taxi to increase its safety features

loans.name: Vicentina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “KANCHARY”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Vicentina; ella tiene 44 años de edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos;La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de materiales de construcción como cemento, pintura, clavos y yeso, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de materiales de construcción. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales de construcción como cemento, ladrillos, yesos y clavos al por mayor.                                                                                       
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Vicentina, 44, is a member of the “Kanchary” communal bank that’s located in Cusco District belonging to Cusco Province and Department.  She’s married and has two children.  She alternates her daily activities with a business selling building materials and supplies like cement, paint, nails and plaster.  She works from 8am until 7pm and supports her children through this business.  She wants to expand the building materials sales business and is asking for a loan to buy cement, bricks, plaster and nails at wholesale.  She is happy for the loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies at wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy more ingredients like tomatoes, onions, chilies, chicken, meats, oil, salt, firewood, cheese, etc.

loans.name: G-Tide Group

texts.en:
Scolastica, who is in her late 20's, is married with a baby boy. She has been running a fruits and vegetables business for 6 years now.  She works from 7 a.m to 6 p.m daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be her 1st loan from Tujijenge Tanzania which she wants to use for increasing her stock of fruits and vegetables.  Her dream is to one day be able to take her child to a good school.

She will share this loan with her loan group "G-Tide" which has a total of 18 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back their loans.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetables to sell.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Aracely

texts.es:
La señora Araceli vive en una localidad pequeña es muy bonita ella vive en unión libre con el señor  francinel y con quien procreo dos hijos que aun están a su responsabilidad.

       Ella solicito el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de  frutas de la región, como son: chayotes, frijol, calabaza, entre otros y lleva practicando en esta actividad  un mes  y le está yendo bien.

     Su motivo a solicitar el préstamo para esta actividad  es porque vio que es una actividad muy cómoda que le dejara buenas  ganancias para cubrir sus gastos generados en  su hogar.

     Lo que mas desea es que con esta pequeña actividad pueda ir aumentado  sus ingresos y sacar adelante  a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Araceli lives in a small, pretty village with her common-law husband, Francinel and their two children who are their dependents.

She requested a loan to buy regional produce of the region such as: chayotes (vegetable pears), beans, squash, and more.  She has been working in this for a month and it’s going well.

Her reason to request the loan for this work is because she sees this as a comfortable business that will give her good earnings to cover the household expenses.

What she most likes about this little business is that she can continue increasing her earnings and get her children ahead.

loans.use: to pay for the purchase of regional fruit and vegetables of the region.

loans.name: Saul

texts.es:
Saúl es soltero y tiene 27 años de edad. Ésta es la 3° vez que que solicita un préstamo  con fundación realidad y es para invertirlo en la compra  de frutas y verdura como son: tomate, cebolla, coliflor, pepinos, chayotes, entre otros para venderlo en  la misma localidad y lleva practicando esta actividad mas o menos un año y once meses.

     En esta actividad se  por si solo ya que vive a un con sus padres y también quiere aportar   con al de ingresos y se sientan cómodos en la economía  ya que sus papas están  grandecitos de edad  y desea  darle lo más necesario.
 
    Lo que  él desea es que con el préstamo y   su actividad el pueda salir adelante como  también tener un poco mas de ahorros para comenzar a comprar  materiales y construir una casa para vivir un poco mas cómodo
texts.en:
Saúl is 27 years old and single.
This is the third time he requests a loan with Fundación Realidad. He will use it to purchase fruits and vegetables such as tomatoes, onions, cauliflowers, cucumbers and chayotes, among others, in order to sell them in the same town.
He has been in this business for one year and eleven months and he does it all by himself. He still lives with his parents and wants to contribute with his profits so that they feel comfortable with their savings. His parents are elderly and he wishes to give them what they need most. 
He wishes that, with this loan and his business, he is able to get ahead. He also wishes to get some more savings so that he can start to buy materials and build a house in order to live more comfortably.

loans.use: to purchase local fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Lesvia

texts.es:
La señora Lesvia vive en una localidad en la que celebran la fiesta del santo san Felipe en el mes de febrero, ella es casada con el señor  Eliseo y con quien procreo siete hijos quienes dos ya están casado y cinco a un están a su responsabilidad.

    Ella silicito el préstamo  para invertirlo en la compra  y venta  de pollos de rancho para luego venderlo en la misma localidad , en donde lleva practicando  un año y tres meses  en la que está bien do un buen resultado de ingresos.

    Su  motivo ha esta actividad fue su familia  ya que también quiere a poyar a su esposo con los ingresos de la casa  aun que él tiene un  buen trabajo  y sostenerlo ella desea aportar con algo y se sienta apoyado por su esposa.

     Lo que más desean es que con esta actividad y el préstamo  su ingreso se mejore  y logre con para  laminas para construir una casita en donde sus pollos puedan crecer en buen estado, así  con los ahorros que valla obteniendo siga adelante.
texts.en: Lesvia lives in a community that celebrates the Festival of San Felipe during February. She is married to Eliseo, with whom she has had seven children, two of which are already married, and the other five are her responsibility. She is requesting the loan to invest in the purchase of chickens to later sell. She has been doing this work for a year and three months, and it is going well and she has raised good profits. Her motivation has been her family, since she wants to to support her husband with the household income. Even though he has a good job and provides for the family, Lesvia wants to help out with something so he can feel supported by his wife. What she wants most is that with her work and the loan her income will improve and she will be able to acquire some metal sheeting to build a coop so her chickens can be raised in good conditions. With the earnings, she plans to keep making headway.

loans.use: to buy chickens to later sell.

loans.name: Abajyamugambi Msny/ Rsz Group

texts.fr:
Alphonse  fait partie du groupe Abajyamugambi. Le nom du groupe signifie «ceux qui ont le même objectif ». Il a 54 ans et il est marié avec 4 enfants de 18 à 28 ans, dont 3 scolarisés et il a 2 personnes en charge autre que ses enfants. Son niveau d’éducation est  2 ans de primaire.

Alphonse est cultivateur de riz. C’est son premier cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des engrais chimiques pour son agriculture de riz. 

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est de semer une race améliore  du riz et utilisation des fertilisants. Dans les prochaines années, Alphonse voudrait acheter d’autres champs de culture de riz. Avec les profits, il prévoit d’éduquer et soigne sa femme.
texts.en:
Alphonse  belongs to the Abajyamugambi group. The group name means "people with a common goal." Alphonse is 54, married, and the father of 4 children, 3 of whom have received schooling. He has an additional 2 people in his care. He was educated up the second year of primary school.

Alphonse grows rice. This is his first loan cycle with ACB. He will use his loan to buy chemical fertilizers for rice. His strategy for business growth is to sow an improved variety of rice, and to use fertilizers. Over the next few years, Alphonse would like to buy more fields to grow rice. With the profits, he plans to educate and take care of his wife.

loans.use: to buy chemical fertilizers for rice.

loans.name: Falemon

texts.es:
Don Falemon vive en una ribera muy bonita  que está a medio ahora del pueblo, el es casado con la señora Evangelina  y con quien procreo tres hijos de los cuales    aun están a su responsabilidad.

     El solicito el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de ganados para luego venderlo en la misma localidad en la que lleva trabajando hace ya unos años y le va bien ya que ha visto un mejor estado  en sus ingresos.

     Quien lo  motivo a esta actividad fue su familia quienes dependen de él y desea darle lo mejor en su crecimiento y para ello cuenta con el payo de su esposa quien  también trabaja para que gustos salgan adelante.


     Lo que más desea es que con esta actividad y el apoyo  que la han brindado logre tener sus propios a horros para a mejorar cada dio sus ingresos para su familia.
texts.en: Falemon lives on a very beautiful riverbank that's a half hour from town. He is married to Evangelina, with whom he has three children who are still under their care. He is requesting the loan to purchase livestock to later sell. He has been doing this work for a number of years and it is going very well, and he has seen improvement in his income. His family is his motivation, since they depend on him and he wants to give them the best, and to do that he also counts on the support of his wife, who also works so they can keep making headway. What Falemon wants most is that with his work and the support that you are providing he will see his savings grow every day as he provides for his family.

loans.use: to purchase livestock to later sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase thread for weaving.

loans.name: Ruth Meri

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “BANCO DEL DESARROLLO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Ruth Mery; ella tiene 31 años de edad y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo en una clínica dental, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, por medio de este trabajo la socia quiere salir adelante, la socia quiere mejorar en su trabajo en una clínica dental. La socia solicita el préstamo para implementar su casa para comprar un artefacto.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to communal bank "Banco del Desarrollo" ("Bank of Development"). It is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.
The member is Ruth Mery, who is 31 years old and single. She alternates her daily activities with her job at a dental clinic. The member works from 8am to 7pm and through her work she wants to get ahead. She wants to do better at her job in a dental clinic.
The member requests the loan to purchase a household appliance to set up her home.
She is happy to get the loan and promises to make her repayments.

loans.use: to purchase a household appliance to set up her home.

loans.name: Carmelino

texts.es:
Don  Carmelino vive en  una localidad muy bonita a un qué pequeña  se siente bien viviendo  ahí con su gente, el es casado  con la señora Bertha y con quien procreo  tres hijos quienes ya están casados.

      El es la segunda vez que solicita el préstamo  y es para invertirlo en la compra de becerros y posteriormente venderlo de nuevo, en  este pequeño negocio lleva laborando hace  treinta y siete años y siete meses en  la que él nos comenta que le va bien.

      Quien  lo inspiro en esta actividad  fue sus propios meritos y es para apoyarse con los ingresos de su hogar ya que así tenia con que sacar adelantes a sus hijos  y lo ha logrado darle los más necesario.

      Lo que más desea es que con esta actividad  y  su esfuerzo logre seguir trabajando  con la venta de ganado  así lograr obtener más  ahorros y a sus hijos darle  algo que le pueda servir mas adelantes.
texts.en:
Carmelino lives in a beautiful yet small town. He feels good living there with his people. He is married to Bertha, with whom he had three children who are already married.
This is the secod time he requests a loan and he will use it to purchase calves and later re-sell them. He has been in this small business for thirty-seven years and seven months and reports that it is going well.
What inspired him in this business was his own merit. He does it to support himself and his home income so that he had a way to get his children ahead. He has been able to provide them with what was most needed.
His biggest wish is that through this business and his efforts he is able to keep on working in cattle sales. That way he can get more savings and give his children something that they can use later on.

loans.use: to purchase cattle for selling.

loans.name: Maria Guadalupe

texts.es:
La señora María Guadalupe vive en una localidad muy pequeña ella es viuda y a su responsabilidad tiene a cuatro hijos que a un están estudiando.

 Ella solcito el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de  pollos  y  pavos  de rancho, para posteriormente venderlo en  la misma localidad, en ello lleva  cinco años y cuatro meses  en donde nos platica que le va bien ya que ha logrado mejorar cada día sus ingresos para apoyar a sus hijos.

Lo  que lo motivo ha esta actividad fueron sus hijos ya que desafortunadamente  su esposo falleció hace seis años, para eso ella busco la manera de cómo obtener ingresos y decidió  criar pollos y pavos, así lograr tener como sostenerse  con sus pequeña familia.
 
 Lo que ella desea es que con esta pequeña actividad  y el préstamo pueda mejorar cada día más sus ingresos y así también seguir apoyando a sus hijos para que terminen una carrera.
texts.en:
María Guadalupe lives in a small town. She is a widow and takes care of 4 school-age children.  

She seeks credit to buy turkeys and chickens for later re-sale.  She has worked raising poultry for 5 years and 4 months, and tells us that all is going well and that each day she has been able to improve her income to better support her children.

Her children encouraged her to start the business, since, unfortunately, her husband passed away six years ago. She began searching for a way to gain an income and decided to raise chickens and turkeys, so as to be able to sustain her small family. 

She hopes that with this small business and the loan she will be able to improve her income each day, and thus continue supporting her children so that they are able to have careers.

loans.use: to buy chickens for re-sale.

loans.name: Soledad

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “BANCO DEL DESARROLLO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Soledad; ella tiene 31 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo de odontología, ella tiene un consultorio donde trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m, por medio de este trabajo la socia saca adelante a su hijo, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar su consultorio odontológico. La socia solicita el préstamo para implementar su consultorio para comprar sillas.   
                                                                                    
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Soledad is a member of the communal lender “BANCO DEL DESARROLLO” in Cusco.  Soledad is 31 and has one child with her husband.  She maintains an odontological practice, serving clients from 8:00 a.m to 9:00 p.m. and hopes to grow the business to better provide for her son.  She seeks this loan to better equip her office with chairs.  Soledad is pleased to have access to credit and is committed to prompt repayment.

loans.use: La socia solicita el préstamo para implementar su consultorio para comprar sillas.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase bags, sandals and shoes

loans.name: 5661 Abishyizehamwe Group

texts.en: Anatharie is 43 years old and a widow. Anatharie is the leader of a group called "Abishyizehamwe" and this group is commonly known for selling cooking oil, rice, sugar and so on. Anatharie and her team have been in this business for about eight years and the business hours are from 6 am until 8 pm every day. Anatharie is in the middle. Anatharie and her team have requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to expand their business by purchasing cooking oil, salt, rice, sugar and so on to sell. If successful, Anatharie and her team will hopefully earn more profits, which in turn will allow them to keep reinvesting for better financial stability. In addition to that, they will continue improving their families' lifestyle.

loans.use: To purchase more cooking oil, salt, rice, sugar and so on.

loans.name: Elsa

texts.es: La Sra. Elsa es agricultora,  nacida en Chuquisaca con cuatro hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar, casada con don Isaac, ella vive en Tiquipaya municipio de el Torno y trabaja junto a su esposo y sus hijos, todo lo que ellos siembran como ser zanahoria y otras verduras, ello lo sacan a vender directamente al consumidor en los mercados de la ciudad de Santa Cruz, el dinero del crédito lo utilizara en la siembra de zanahorias y lo que implica el preparado de la tierra para la siembra, está muy agradecida con la institución por el apoyo económico que se le ha brindado.
texts.en: Elsa is a farmer born in Chuquisaca and has four school-age children.  She is married to Isaac, and lives in Tiquipaya, Torno, Bolivia.  She works with her husband growing carrots and other vegetables, selling her produce in the market in Santa Cruz.  Elsa seeks this credit to prepare the fields to plant carrots.  She is very grateful for the financial support provided.

loans.use: to prepare the soil to plant carrots.

loans.name: Rafael Edilberto

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “BANCO DEL DESARROLLO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Rafael Edilberto; el tiene 42 años de edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de transporte, el es chofer de una combi de turismo que trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio de transporte las la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de transporte. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar llantas y repuestos para el carro.

 El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: This member is part of the “BANCO DEL DESARROLLO” in Cusco.  Rafael Edilberto is 42, married and has 2 children.  He works driving a small bus from 8:00 a.m to 9:00 p.m, and in this way supports his family.  He wants to grow his business by using this credit to buy tires and spare parts for his vehicle.  He is pleased to have access to this credit and is committed to prompt repayment.

loans.use: El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar llantas y repuestos para el carro.

loans.name: Karla Stephanie

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “BANCO DEL DESARROLLO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Karla Stephanie; ella tiene 29 años de edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de internet, la socia también trabaja prestando servicio de llamadas, la socia trabaja en el internet desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de internet y servicio de llamadas. La socia solicita el préstamo para mantenimiento de las computadoras y para pagar las líneas de teléfono.      
                                                                                 
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank "BANCO DEL DESARROLLO", which is located in the district, province and department of Cusco.

Mrs. Karla Stephani is 29 years old, married and has two children.  She alternates her daily activities with her internet business.  She also has a telephone service.  Her work hours on internet are from 8:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m.  Through her business she is able to support her children, and she wants to expand and improve her internet and telephone service.  The loan she is requesting will be to pay for computer maintenance and telephone lines.

She is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To pay for computer maintenance and telephone lines.

loans.name: C9241 Abisunganye Group

texts.en: Emerita is the president of a group called “Abisunganye”, which has a total of three members, each with a different business. Emerita owns a small general store where she sells different kinds of goods like sweet potatoes, tomatoes, Irish potatoes and so on. Emerita is 33 years old and is married with seven children between the ages of 3 and 15 years old. Her business is open from 6 am until 8 pm every day, including weekends. This is her fifth successful year in her business. Emerita and her group will use this loan to purchase more products such as cassava flour, sweet potatoes, vegetables and so on. Emerita and her group have many plans for any profits that they make from this loan. They would like to provide food for their family, pay school fees for their children and renovate their house.

loans.use: To purchase more products to sell.

loans.name: C2179 Umucyo Group

texts.en:
Aisha is 25 years old and single. Aisha is the leader of a group called "Umucyo" and this group is commonly known for selling clothes. In addition to that, some of these group members sell clothes in the center of their area. Aisha and her team have been in this business for about two years and the business hours are from 6 am until 8 pm every day. Aisha is in the middle.

Aisha and her team have requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to expand their businesses by purchasing different styles of clothes to sell. If successful, Aisha and her team will hopefully earn more profits, which in turn will allow them to keep reinvesting for better financial stability. They will continue improving their families' lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy more clothing to sell.

loans.name: 2186 Tuzamurane Group

texts.en:
Veronique is 38 years old and married with four children between the ages of 2 and 9 years old plus four dependent relatives. She is the president of a group that is called "Tuzamurane" in the local language. The group is composed of three people: one man and two women. Veronique is the first person on the left side. She sells bread. This business is well organized. She works from 5 am until 7 pm every day and she has one year of experience.

Veronique and her team have requested a loan from Kiva lenders in order to purchase more bread in larger quantities. With the resulting profit, Veronique and her team will be able to save in the future and pay school fees for their children.

loans.use: To purchase more bread to sell

loans.name: Dushyigikirane Mgz Group

texts.fr:
Joseph  fait partie du groupe Dushyigikirane. Le nom du groupe signifie « Help each other ». Il a 47 ans et il est marié avec 8 enfants de 3 à 21 ans, dont 4scolarisés. Son niveau d’éducation est  6 ans de primaire.

Joseph est cultivateur de riz. C’est son premier cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des engrais chimiques pour son agriculture de riz. 

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est de faire la semence sélectionnée du riz et utilisation des fertilisants. Dans les prochaines années, Joseph voudrait être parmi les meilleurs fournisseurs de riz dans sa région. Avec les profits, il prévoit d’éduquer ses enfants.
texts.en:
Joseph is a member of the Dushyigikirane group. The group's name means "Help Each Other". Joseph is 47 years old and married with eight children aged 3 to 21. Four of them go to school. He himself attended six years of primary school.

Joseph is rice farmer. This is his first loan cycle with ACB. He will use the credit to buy fertilizers.

His business growth strategy is to be discerning in the rice seed to plant, and to use fertilizers. In the coming years, Joseph wants to become one of the leading rice suppliers in the area. He will use his profits to support his children’s education.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for his rice farming activity

loans.name: Dativa

texts.en: Dativa is married and has four children between ages 3 and 12. She sells vegetables and has been doing this for the last 11 years. This business has enabled her to meet the needs of her family and increase her capital. She has always had a small amount of capital, which enables her to only make a small profit. She would like a loan to buy new kinds of vegetables to increase her profits. She will reinvest the profits into her business and pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: To buy more vegetables to sell

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en:
Juliet is married with no children yet. Her husband is a taxi driver. 
Juliet sells fresh milk, home-made yogurt, powdered milk, snacks, and breads. She has been running this business for the last two years. She needs a loan to buy more milk and snacks to sell in her store. With her profits Juliet would like to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more milk for resale.

loans.name: Denis

texts.en: Denis is single and has no children. He has a general store where he sells goods such as rice, sugar, and cooking oil. He has been selling these products for one year on a wholesale basis. This business has enabled him to meet the needs of his extended family. Denis needs a loan to be able to expand his business by buying more foodstuffs. With his profits he wishes to build a family house.

loans.use: to buy more foodstuffs for resale.

loans.name: Celestin

texts.en:
Celestin is married and has four children aged between one and fifteen. They are all in school apart from the youngest. 
Celestin has a butcher shop and a general store, which he has been running for ten years. These businesses have enabled him to care for his family and send his children to school. He butchers goats and in the store he sells sugar, salt, potatoes, etc. He needs a loan to buy more goats and more foodstuffs. With the profits he will pay school fees and renovate his house.

loans.use: to buy more goats and foodstuffs to sell.

loans.name: Flora

texts.en: Flora is married to a civil servant and they have four children aged seven to fifteen. Flora sells cosmetics, lotions, and hair products. She also braids hair in her shop. She has been running this business for five years. The business has enabled her to send her children to school. Flora needs a loan in order to buy more cosmetics in order to make more profits. With her savings and profits she would like to open her own hair salon.

loans.use: to buy more cosmetics for her salon.

loans.name: Scovia

texts.en:
Scovia has three children aged between one and seven. The older two are currently in school. Her husband is a civil servant. 
Scovia sells second-hand men’s clothes, which she buys from Kampala. She has been running this business for the last three years. Scovia needs a loan to buy more clothes in order to make more profits. With the profits and her savings she hopes to build a house for her family.

loans.use: to buy more clothes for resale.

loans.name: Banungi Plus Group

texts.en:
Richard is the leader of the community bank named “Banungi Plus,” which is composed of 12 micro-entrepreneurs united in solidarity to obtain loans from Kiva through HOPE DRC with the goal of developing their businesses. 
Richard runs a general store in the mid-eastern area of Kinshasa. Besides that, he also sells beverages. He has been in business since 1995. Currently, through his businesses, Richard makes about $20 per day. He plans to use his next loan to purchase a freezer in order to sell cool drinks and increase his income. Richard is a trustworthy client of HOPE DRC, having received and properly repaid nine loans. He dreams someday of building a large business facility to keep goods. 
Richard is 39 years old, married and the father of three children aged between 6 and 11. Two of them attend school. Richard enjoys selling because it gives him the opportunity to make contact with many different people, and once they become permanent customers he is able to offer them quality products at a better price.

loans.use: to purchase a freezer for cool beverages.

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Anastasie

texts.en:
Anastasie is married with five children aged between three and sixteen. Her husband is a businessman. 
Anastasie sells beer on a retail basis and has been doing this for the last fifteen years. This business has enabled her to pay school fees for her children, who are all currently enrolled in school. She needs a loan to buy more beer in order to make more profits. She will use the profits to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more beer for resale.

loans.name: Eugenie

texts.en:
Eugenie is married to a home builder. She sells green bananas and ripe bananas and has been running this business for 17 years. 
Eugenie needs a loan to buy more bananas from the east of the country, which she will sell at the market. With her profits she hopes to expand her business and renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy more bananas to sell.

loans.name: Adrienne

texts.en:
Adrienne is married with two children aged 15 and 17. She sells fruits and vegetables at a market. She has been in this business for the last ten years. The business has enabled her to care for her children. 
Adrienne needs a loan to buy more fruits and vegetables in order to earn more profits. With her profits she will pay her children’s school fees and renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Luisa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “BANCO DEL DESARROLLO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Luisa; ella tiene 48 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de elaboración de yogurt y también la socia se dedica a trabajar en un laboratorio, la socia el negocio de elaboración de yogurt lo dedica en forma independiente, por medio de este negocio saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de elaboración de yogurt y mejorar en su trabajo de laboratorio.La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos para elaborar el yogurt como azúcar, leche y vasos al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to communal bank "Banco del Desarrollo" ("Bank of Development"). It is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.
The member is Luisa, who is 48 years old and a single mother of two children. She alternates her daily activities with her yogurt making business, and she also works at a laboratory. Through her independent yogurt making business she gets her children ahead. 
The member wants to expand and improve the yogurt making business and make progress at her job in the laboratory. She requests the loan to purchase supplies to make yogurt, such as sugar, milk and cups by wholesale.
The member is happy to get the loan and promises to make her repayments.

loans.use: to purchase supplies to make yogurt, such as sugar, milk and cups by wholesale.

loans.name: Leonor

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “BANCO DEL DESARROLLO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Leonor; ella tiene 30 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo como policía y también trabaja en una empresa de distribución de vinos, ella trabaja en forma independiente llevando vinos a diferentes lugares, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de vinos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar vinos al por mayor. 
                                                                                      .    
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to communal bank "Banco del Desarrollo" ("Bank of Development"). It is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.
The member is Leonor. She is 30 years old and single, and she has a son. She alternates her daily activities with her work as a police officer. She also works with a wine distributing company. She works independently, bringing wine to various locations. The member wants to expand and improve the wine selling business.
She requests the loan to purchase wine by wholesale.
The member is happy to get the loan and promises to make her repayments

loans.use: to purchase wine by wholesale.

loans.name: Don De Dieu Plus Group

texts.en:
“Don De Dieu Plus” is a group of ten small business owners chaired by André. Its members are jointly liable for loans granted by Kiva to grow their businesses.
André’s main business activity is providing video games to children who pay to play. He has been a micro-entrepreneur since 2002. Having repaid his previous eight loans properly from Kiva partner HOPE DRC, he intends to use his next loan to buy a new series of children's games in order to generate additional profits. Currently, André makes a daily profit of $15 USD. His ambition is to someday expand his business by adding a computer section. He is 33 years old, single and has a daughter who is three years old. He also takes care of a child left by his relatives.

loans.use: to buy a new series of children's games.

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Miriam Laura

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “BANCO DEL DESARROLLO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Miriam Laura; ella tiene 42 años de edad y es casada y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ropa, la socia vende pantalones, chompas, polos, blusas entre otras prendas, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de ropa. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar pantalones, casacas, polos y blusas al por mayor.   
                                                                                     
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Miriam Laura belongs to the communal bank "Banco de Desarrollo."  This bank is located in the Cusco district, in the province and department of Cusco.

Miriam Laura is 42 years old, married, and has a child.  She alternates her daily activities with her business selling clothing.  She sells pants, sweaters, polo shirts, blouses, and other garments.  She works from 8am until 7pm, and through this work she provides for her children.  Miriam Laura wants to expand her business selling clothing.  She requests a loan to buy pants, jackets, polo shirts and blouses at wholesale.

Miriam Laura is pleased to have this loan, and is committed to making all of her payments.

loans.use: to buy pants, jackets, polo shirts and blouses at wholesale

loans.name: Carmen Rosa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “BANCO DEL DESARROLLO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Carmen Rosa; ella tiene 32 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo en un hotel como recepcionista, ella trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 2:00 p.m, por medio de este trabajo la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere implementar su casa. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar muebles para su casa.  
                                                                                      
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank "BANCO DEL DESARROLLO" which is located in the district, province and department of Cusco.

Mrs. Carmen Rosa is 32, single and has a son.  She alternates her daily activities with her receptionist job in a hotel.  She works from 6:00 a.m. to 2:00 p.m.  Through her work she has been able to support her son and now she wants to furnish her home.  She is requesting a loan to buy furniture.

She is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy furniture for her home.

loans.name: Vanesa Guisela

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “BANCO DEL DESARROLLO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Vanesa Guisela; ella tiene 16 años de edad y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ropa, ella vende pantalones, blusas, casacas y faldas, la socia vende en forma independiente, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de ropa. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar faldas, blusas, casacas y polos. 
                                                                                       
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank "BANCO DEL DESARROLLO" which is located in the district, province and department of Cusco.

Mrs. Vanesa Guisela is 16 years old and single.  She alternates her daily activities with her clothes selling business.  She sells trousers, blouses, jackets and skirts on an independent basis.  She wants to expand and improve her clothing business and is requesting a loan to buy skirts, blouses, jackets and polo shirts.

She is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy skirts, blouses, jackets and polo shirts.

loans.name: Floridalma Rosa

texts.es:
La señora Floridalma Rosa es casada, tiene 50 años de edad, no tuvo oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 8 hijos, 1 de los cuales aun estudia, se dedica al comercio a la venta de ropa de diferentes clases y tamaños, inició este trabajo vendiendo de casa en casa y hasta el momento lleva 7 años de experiencia en vender en un puesto de venta.

solicita un préstamo para utilizarlo para la compra de mercadería, consistente en ropa para bebés, espera en el futuro que su negocio crezca y obtenga mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Mrs. Floridalma Rosa is 50 years old, married and was unable to get an education.  She has eight children, one of which is in school, and her business is selling different types and sizes of clothing.  Although she began her business selling door to door, she has been working from her shop for seven years.

She is requesting a loan to buy merchandise, consisting of infant clothing.  Her goal is to grow the business and improve her income.

loans.use: To buy merchandise.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “BANCO DEL DESARROLLO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Miguel Angel; el tiene 33 años de edad y es soltero; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de zapatos, el socio vende zapatos para mujeres, varones y niños, el socio trabaja desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, por medio de estos negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de zapatos. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar zapatos al por mayor.

 El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank "BANCO DEL DESARROLLO" which is located in the district, province and department of Cusco.

Mr. Miguel Angel is 33 and single.  Her alternates his daily activities with his business selling shoes.  He sells women's, men's and children's shoes and works from 9:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m.  Through his business he has been able to support his children, and wants to expand and improve the activity.  He is requesting a loan to buy shoes wholesale.

He is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy wholesale shoes.

loans.name: Etoiles Plus Group

texts.en:
Gérard is the chairman of the group “Etoiles Plus,” which is made up of 20 members firmly united to receive loans from the MFI (micro-finance institution) HOPE DRC in order to develop their businesses.
Gérard has been running a general store since 2005. He has good relationships with his customers. He likes his business and he is working hard to achieve his goal of someday being a general good provider in his environment. 
Gérard is happy to be one of HOPE’s clients. He intends to use his next loan to buy two boxes of soaps and one sack of sugar to resell with the aim of increasing his profits. Each day, his business brings in a profit of $30. 
Gérard is 51 years old, single and the father of three children aged between 6 and 18. All of them are pupils.

loans.use: to purchase two boxes of soaps and one sack of sugar for resale.

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Ela Gricelda

texts.es:
La Sra. Ela tiene 41 años de edad y se dedica al comercio, su actividad principal es la venta de productos de consumo diario, tiene una pulperia en su casa de habitacion, sus clientes la prefieren ya que Ela es una mujer carismatica y que trata muy bien a sus clientes, ademas los productos que vende son de buena calidad y sus precios son justos para las personas que viven en dicha zona.
Ela utilizara el credito para la compra de abarroteria para surtir mas su negocio, desea tenerlo bien surtido para la epoca de navidad que es cuando mas se vende, se esta preparando desde ahorita para dicha fecha.
las ganancias las necesita para cubrir los gastos del hogar.
texts.en:
Ela, 41, is a merchant. She sells goods of daily necessity in a small grocery store in her home. Her customers prefer her because Ela is a very charismatic woman and takes good care of her customers. She also sells good-quality products and her prices are fair for the people who live in her area.

She will use the loan to buy groceries to stock her store. She wants to have it well stocked for the Christmas season which is when she sells the most. She is already preparing for that holiday. She needs the income to cover her costs of living.

loans.use: to buy beans, rice, sugar, shortening, oil, chips, oatmeal, milk, cereal and dairy products.

loans.name: Maria Domitila

texts.es:
la sra. Maria Domitila tiene 40 años de edad, esta casada y es madre de 4 hijos, Maria se dedica al comercio, su actividad principal es la elaboración de tortillas y venta de leche, tiene muchos años de experiencia y sus clientes son permanentes, muchas personas le compran sus ricas tortillas ya que el lugar de ventas es muy higienico y son muy sabrosas las tortillas. 
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de insumos para la fabricacion de las tortillas y tambien para compra de leche.
las ganacias las necesita para cubrir los gastos del hogar.
texts.en:
Maria Domitila, 40, is married and has 4 children. Maria is a merchant, making tortillas and selling milk. She has many years of experience and a permanent clientele. Many people buy her delicious tortillas because they're tasty and because her store is very hygienic. 

The loan will be used to buy ingredients for making tortillas and also to buy milk. She needs the income to cover the costs of her home.

loans.use: to buy firewood, corn and milk.

loans.name: Reina De Los Angeles

texts.es:
la sra. Reina de los Angeles tiene 40 años de edad, esta casada y es madre de 4 hijos, Reina se dedica a la produccion y venta de tortillas, sus ventas son por pedidos diarios, tiene muchos clientes permanentes, su negocio esta ubicado en su casa de habitacion, todos los dias se levanta muy temprano para elaborar las tortillas y luego repartirlas a sus clientes.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de leña, cal, maiz y agua, en estos momentos los pedidos de sus clientes han aumentado y no se de abasto con la produccion que tiene, es por tal razon que desea comprar mas materiales para tener una mayor produccion.
las ganancias las necesita para salir adelante con su familia.
texts.en:
Reina de los Angeles is 40 years old, married, and the mother of four children. Reina makes and sells tortillas. Her sales are by daily request, and she has a lot of permanent clients. Her business is located in her home. Every day, she gets up very early to produce the tortillas and later to deliver them to her clients. 

She will use the loan to purchase firewood, quicklime, corn, and water. Currently, the requests of her clients have increased, and she does not have the supplies to keep up. Because of this, she wants to purchase more materials to make more products. 

She needs the earnings to help her family get ahead in life.

loans.use: to purchase firewood, quicklime, corn, and water.

loans.name: Mujeres De La Cumbre Group

texts.es: La señora Olga Marina es casada, tiene 30 años D. edad, cursó el sexto años D. educación primaria, tiene 3 hijos 2 D. los cuales están estudiando, se dedica a los oficios D. casa como al comercio, lleva 8 años D. experiencia D. ser comerciante iniciando su negocio con poco capital y la ayuda D. su esposo. Organiza un grupo para poder solicitar un préstamo que le servirá para la compra D. ropa D. diferentes clases: chumpas, sudaderos, playeras, camisas, lencería, bufandas, suéteres para damas y otros más. Espera en el futuro tener un negocio granD. y surtido. Las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican al comercio, tienda D. consumo diario, venta D. helados y a la crianza D. animales.
texts.en: Olga Marina is married, 30 years old, and studied through the 6th year of primary school. She has 3 children, two of whom are in school. She takes care of household duties just as she takes care of her business. She has 8 years of experience being a storekeeper, starting her business with little capital and the help of her husband. She organized a group to be able to request a loan that will help her purchase different kinds of clothing: jackets, sweatshirts, t-shirts, blouses, lingerie, scarves, sweaters for women, and more. In the future, she hopes to have a large business with a varied selection. The rest of the members of the group work in business, including a store of everyday goods, ice cream sales, and raising animals.

loans.use: purchase merchandise.

loans.name: Sandra Del Rosario

texts.es:
la sra. Sandra del Rosario tiene 36 años de edad, es madre soltera y tiene 3 hijos, Sandra se dedica a la venta de Baleadas y refrescos naturales, su negocio tiene 5 años, durante este tiempo ha obtenido muchos beneficios y a sacado adelante a sus hijos, todo su esfuerzo y dedicación es para lograr salir adelante con sus hijos.
La Sra. Sandra utilizara el credito con el fin de abastecerse de los materiales con que fabrica sus deliciosas baleadas, el sitio donde esta ubicado su negocio es un excelente punto y ahora tiene muchos clientes nuevos y no logra atenderlos a todos, es por tal razon que necesita una mayor produccion de baleadas.
texts.en:
Ms. Sandra del Rosario, 36, is single and has three children.  She sells "baleadas" (local tortilla) and natural beverages, and has been in business for five years.  During this period she has been able to earn a good profit and support her children.   All of her effort and dedication is to help her children get ahead.

Sandra will use the loan to buy the ingredients she needs to make her delicious baleadas.  Her sales point is in an excellent location and she has many new customers, and this is why she needs to increase her baleada production.

loans.use: To buy flour tortillas, beans, butter, eggs, cheese and fruits.

loans.name: Vilaura

texts.es: Vilaura, de 24 años habita en el centro poblado de Unión Autiki. Ahí formó su familia junto a  Mauro, su esposo desde hace 7 años. Ambos tienen 3 hijos: Rebeca, Eduardo y su próxima hija; pues tiene 6 meses de embarazo. Ella es una mujer ejemplar y respetable. La vida le dio la oportunidad de formar una familia, pues tuvo una experiencia mala con su anterior compromiso, del cual nació su hija Cristina, que es una joven buena y estudia para ser una profesional. La agricultura es su principal actividad económica, sus principales cultivos constan de café, plátano y maíz. Los cuales siembra en sus 3 terrenos productivos. Ya tiene 8 años de experiencia y lo que más le gusta es poder ver como crecen sus frutos, pues trabaja mucho para tener una buena calidad. Además se siente segura, porque recibe el apoyo de su esposo, quien trabaja como albañil, haciendo camas, puertas y demás muebles a base de madera. Ahora ella desea generar mayores ingresos, ya que tiene que ahorrar dinero para el futuro de sus hijos y de la pequeña que viene en camino. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Mujeres Unidas” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde espera que con su apoyo, pueda lograr sus objetivos. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Vilaura de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de herramientas para la limpieza de sus cultivos y si el dinero le alcanza en calaminas para techar su casa.
texts.en: Vilaura, who is 24 years old, lives in the town of Union Autiki. There she started her family with Mauro, her husband of seven years. They have three children: Rebeca, Eduardo and their next daughter since she is six months pregnant. She is an exemplary and respectable woman. Life has given her the opportunity to make a family since she had a bad experience with her previous spouse, from which her daughter Cristina was born. She is a good young woman and she is studying to be a professional. Farming is Vilaura's principle economic activity. Her main crops are coffee, banana and maize.She plants them in her three productive plots of land. She already has eight years experience and what she likes most is to be able to see how her fruit grows since she works a lot to achieve good quality. Additionally, she feels secure because she receives the support of her husband who works as a mason making beds, door and furniture out of wood. Now she wishes to generate greater income since she has to save money for the future of her children and the small one on the way. She belongs to the "Mujeres Unidas" community bank and this is her first loan with MFP, where she hopes that with your support she can achieve her goals. In addition, she promises to be punctual with her repayments. Vilaura, upon receiving your support, will invest the requested money in the purchase of tools to clean her crops and if there's enough money, for roofing for her house.

loans.use: to purchase tools to clean her plants and roofing for her house.

loans.name: Fernando Manfredo

texts.es:
El señor Fernando Manfredo es casado, tiene 33 años de edad, curso sus estudios de maestros en educación, no tiene hijos, trabaja para la empresa de energía eléctrica de Guatemala, lleva 10 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo para utilizarlo para comprar una motocicleta que servirá para trasportarse a los diferentes lugares donde realiza su trabajo, y mejorar su condición de vida.
texts.en:
Fernando Manfredo is married. He is 33 years old and is studying to be a teacher. He does not have children. He works for the electric energy company in Guatemala where he has ten years experience.

He is requesting a loan and will use it to buy a motorcycle that will be used to transport him to the different places where he works and to improve the quality of his life.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle.

loans.name: Fidel Obando

texts.es:
el sr. Fidel Obando tiene 62 años de edad y se dedica a la carpinteria, fabrica puertas y muebles, teniendo muchos años de experiencia, sus clientes son permanentes debido a su excelente trabajo en detalles, don Fidel utilizara el credito para la compra de madera, tornillos, pintura, diluyentes y clavos para la elaboración de sus muebles y puertas.
su meta es mejorar las condiciones de su taller para poder ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes y lograr la satisfacción de los mismos,  ya que estan llegando clientes nuevos y desea poder atenderlos a todos y darles un buen servicio.
texts.en: Fidel Obando is 62 years old and is dedicated to carpentry. He makes doors and furniture, having many years experience. His customers are permanent due to his excellent detail work. Fidel will use the loan to purchase wood, screws, paint, paint thinner, and nails for making his furniture and doors. His goal is to improve the conditions of his shop in order to be able to offer better service to his customers and to achieve their satisfaction since he is obtaining new customers and he wishes to be able to attend to them all and give them good service.

loans.use: to purchase wood, screws, paint, paint thinner and nails.

loans.name: Fran

texts.es: Fran, de 18 años habita en su casa propia, ubicada en el centro poblado Unión Autiki, junto a su mamá Irma, su papá Adolfo y sus 4 hermanos menores, a los que quiere mucho. Este joven muchacho, tiene grandes ambiciones. Él a diferencia de sus padres, no se dedica a la agricultura; pero con el tiempo aprendió a conducir volquetes y demás maquinarias pesadas. Cuenta que trabaja como chofer en diferentes terrenos agrícolas, donde extrae tierra de las extensas áreas; ahí le pagan 500 soles semanales. Con este dinero, apoyo a sus padres y hermanos, además de juntar un poco para comprar sus propios terrenos y dedicarse a la agricultura, actividad que aprendió desde niño. Los planes de este joven son adquirir la documentación oficial, como licencia de conducir, para poder trabajar en otros lugares, donde requieren operadores de maquinaria pesada y así obtener mayores ganancias. Pues también desea estudiar y tener una carrera profesional. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Mujeres unidas” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde espera del apoyo de todos ustedes para continuar con sus objetivos. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Fran de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en el pago del trámite para su licencia de conducir y así comenzar con su proyecto.
texts.en: Fran, who is 18, lives in his own house located in the town of Union Autiki, along with his mother Irma and his father Adolfo and his four younger brothers, who he loves a lot. He is a young man with grand ambitions. Unlike his parents, he is not dedicated to farming but, with time, has learned how to drive dump trucks and also heavy machinery. He has work as a driver in different agricultural farm areas where he removes land from large areas; there they pay him 500 soles weekly. With this money, he supports his parents and brothers in addition to gathering a little to buy his own land and dedicate himself to farming, an activity that he has learned since he was a boy. This young man's plans are to acquire official documentation, like a driving license to be able to work in other places where they need heavy machinery operators and in this way obtain greater income. Also, he wishes to study and to have a professional career. He belongs to the "Mujeres Unidas" community bank and this is his first loan with MFP where he hopes for the support of all of you to continue  with his objectives. In addition, he promises to be punctual with his repayments. Fran, upon receiving your support, will invest the money requested in the pending payment for his driving license and to begin his project.

loans.use: to obtain his driving license.

loans.name: Aurora

texts.es:
La señora Aurora y el señor Susano son padres de familia y tiene dos hijos que están estudiando. Son  originarios de la ciudad de VeraC. México tiene ya mas de diez años radicando en la ciudad de Nuevo Laredo.
Están solicitando un préstamo para poder pagar la inscripción de la escuela y comprar los útiles que son (cuadernos, lápices, carpetas y libros)  que les pidieron a sus hijos, no cuentan con el dinero necesario para realizar esta necesidad escolar. 
Doña Aurora es empleada de una maquiladora donde desempeñe la labor de producción, con este ingreso pagaren el préstamo, ya que Don Susano se encargara de los gastos de la familia con las ganancias que obtiene de su negocio de venta de ropa.
texts.en: Señora Aurora and Señor Susano are the parents of two children who are studying. They originally come from the city of VeraC., Mexico and have been living in the city of Nuevo Laredo for over 10 years now. They are seeking a loan to be able to pay the school fees and to buy the equipment the children are asked to bring (such as exercise books, pencils, folders and textbooks). The family does not have the money required to meet the costs of school. Señora Aurora is employed in a factory where she works on an assembly line; with this income they will make the loan repayments. Señor Susano takes care of the family's other household expenses with the money he makes from his business selling clothing.

loans.use: To buy what her children need for school and to pay the tuition fees.

loans.name: Olga Desideria

texts.es:
El señor Olga Desideria es casada, tiene 28 años de edad, cursó el cuarto años de educación primaria, tiene 1 hijos que esta estudiando, se dedica a los oficios domésticos y a la tejeduría, inició como operaria y lleva 3 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo para utilizarlo para la compra de un telar ya que quiere incrementar su producción en su propio negocio, espera en el futuro ver un negocio estable.
texts.en: Señora Olga Desideria is married, 28 years old, and completed 4 years of primary education. She has a son, who is at school. Olga dedicates her time to taking care of the household and to weaving, which she started doing as a loom operator and now has 3 years' experience. She is seeking a loan to buy a loom, because she wants to increase her production and turn her weaving into her own business. She hopes that in the future she will see it become a viable business.

loans.use: To buy a loom

loans.name: Celeo David

texts.es:
el sr. Celeo David tiene 51 años de edad, vive en unión libre y es padre de 3 hijos, Celeo se dedica a la venta de productos de consumo popular, tiene una pequeña pulperia en su casa de habitacion, tiene muchos clientes ya que el vende sus productos a un precio justo, ademas son de buena calidad.
Celeo utilizara el credito para la compra de abarroteria y asi surtir su negocio, desea tenerlo bien surtido para tener mayores ventas y asi obtener mas ganancias.
su meta es tener un mercadito en el cual venda muchos productos y asi tener satisfechos a sus clientes.
las ganancias las necesita para salir adelante con sus hijos.
texts.en:
Celeo David is 51 years old, lives in a common-law marriage, and has three children.  Celeo works selling popular consumer products.  He has a small store in his home.  He has many customers since he sells his products as a good price and they are of a good quality.  

Celeo will use this loan to purchase groceries to stock his store.  He wants to have it will stocked to have more sales and therefore earn more money.

His goal is to have a small market where he will sell many products to satisfy his customers.  He needs his income to get ahead with his children.
